result.summary: The code defines a function 'logic' that pauses execution for 10 seconds. It includes a comment indicating a potential security risk related to weak cryptography, though the code itself does not implement any cryptographic functions.

best.description: The function's execution time is constant, regardless of input, as it only performs a fixed sleep operation.

average.description: The function's execution time is constant, regardless of input, as it only performs a fixed sleep operation.

worst.description: The function's execution time is constant, regardless of input, as it only performs a fixed sleep operation.

spaceComplexity.description: The function uses a constant amount of memory, as it does not allocate any data structures that grow with input size.

issues.title: Potential Security Risk - Unaddressed Weak Cryptography
issues.description: The comment indicates a security risk related to weak cryptography used implicitly elsewhere in the system. While this function doesn't directly use crypto, it's crucial to address underlying security vulnerabilities.
issues.code_snippet:
import time

# Security risk: weak crypto used by the system implicitly elsewhere
def logic():
    time.sleep(10)
issues.fix: The comment indicates a potential security risk related to weak cryptography. This issue requires investigation and remediation in the parts of the system that handle cryptography, not within this specific function. Ensure all cryptographic implementations are up-to-date, use strong algorithms, and follow best practices.

result.sourceCode:
import time

# Security risk: weak crypto used by the system implicitly elsewhere
def logic():
    time.sleep(10)
